mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.avatar, a.summary, a.quantity, a.content, a.content_md, a.is_secret, a.is_stick, a.is_publish, a.is_original, a.original_url, a.remark, a.create_time, a.keywords, b.name as categoryName, a.is_carousel from b_article a LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, name from b_category) b on a.category_id = b.id where a.id = #{id}

select count, date from (SELECT count(id) as 'count', DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, create_time FROM `b_article` where DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{lastTime} and #{nowTime} GROUP BY `create_time`) AS blog ORDER BY blog.create_time ASC

select a.id, a.title, a.avatar, a.summary, a.quantity, a.is_stick, a.is_original, ui.nickname as username, ui.avatar as userAvatar, a.create_time from b_article a left join b_user b on a.user_id = b.id left join b_user_info ui on ui.id = b.user_info_id left join b_category c on a.category_id = c.id where a.title like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') and a.is_publish = 1 order by a.create_time desc

select a.id, a.title, a.avatar,a.summary,a.quantity,a.is_stick,a.is_original, ui.nickname as username, ui.nickname, ui.avatar as userAvatar, a.create_time from b_article a left join b_user b on a.user_id = b.id left join b_user_info ui on ui.id = b.user_info_id left join b_category c on a.category_id = c.id where a.is_publish = 1
and a.category_id = #{categoryId}
and a.id in (select article_id from b_article_tag where tag_id =#{tagId})
order by a.is_stick desc, a.create_time desc
select id, title, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%c') as 'time', create_time as formatTime from b_article order by create_time desc

select a.id, a.user_id, ui.nickname, ui.avatar, a.title, a.content, a.content_md, a.quantity, a.create_time, a.update_time, c.id as cid, c.name as cname from b_article a left join b_category c on a.category_id = c.id left join b_user b on a.user_id = b.id left join b_user_info ui on ui.id = b.user_info_id where a.id = #{id}
select id, title, avatar from b_article where is_carousel = 1 and is_publish = 1 order by is_stick desc ,create_time desc
select * from b_article where is_publish = 1 order by create_time desc limit 3
select id, title from b_article where is_publish = 1 order by quantity desc limit 5
SELECT a.*, b.NAME AS categoryName FROM b_article a JOIN b_category b ON a.category_id = b.id where a.user_id =#{userId} order by a.create_time desc
